scripts.build:admin: REACT_APP_TYPE=admin react-scripts build && mv build build-admin
scripts.build:cliente: REACT_APP_TYPE=cliente react-scripts build && mv build build-cliente
scripts.build:both: npm run build:admin && npm run build:cliente
scripts.capacitor:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.android:build: npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.android:release: npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.deploy:admin: npm run build:admin && firebase deploy --only hosting:admin
scripts.deploy:cliente: npm run build:cliente && firebase deploy --only hosting:cliente
